headline: Why Ulta Beauty Is a Still a 'Top Pick' Despite CEO Transition

headline: Ulta Beauty Stock Jumps. A New CEO Goes a Long Way.
summary: CEO Dave Kimbell is stepping down effective immediately, Ulta said Monday, and will stay on as an advisor through June 28.

headline: Ulta Beauty names Kecia Steelman as new president and CEO
summary: This leadership change follows the retirement of Dave Kimbell, who has been with Ulta Beauty for eleven years.
